title: Lolclient will not load.
body:
Well for the last 20 minutes i've been trying to get my lolclient to load, but it won't open no matter what i try.

Everytime i try to load the game a file called "lockfile" appears in the league folder. If that means anything.

replies.body: That lockfile is something that appears when League is in the process of patching in order to prevent you from messing with internal files during the update process. If that kept popping up there's a decent chance that League was already running in the background. Huzzah for getting it figured out though! If it happens again in the future, make sure to check your task manager to close any leftover League processes.
Finally loaded after 30 minutes of waiting. Probably something wrong with my computer.
